content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ يَوْمَ الْخَمِيْسِ سُنَّةً ِللهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu sauma yaumal khomiisi  sunnatan lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Saya niat puasa hari Kamis, sunnah karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to fast on Thursday, as a sunnah practice for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
